item.title: Associate Professorship (or Professorship) of Complex Systems – Closing date: Mon, 12 Jan 2026 - 12:00
item.description: Mathematical Institute in association with Lincoln College Associate Professorship (or Professorship) of Complex Systems The Mathematical Institute proposes to appoint an Associate Professor (or Professor) of Complex Systems from 1 August 2026 or as soon as possible thereafter. item.title: Postdoctoral Research Associate in Geometry Group Theory – Closing date: Wed, 07 Jan 2026 - 12:00
item.description: We are currently inviting applications for a Postdoctoral Research Associate to work with Professor Dawid Kielak at the Mathematical Institute, University of Oxford. This is a 3-year, fixed-term position, funded by a research grant from the ERC. The successful candidate will be expected to be in post by 1st September 2026, or as soon as possible thereafter.

item.title: Regius Professorship of Mathematics – Closing date: Mon, 12 Jan 2026 - 12:00
item.description: Mathematical Institute in association with Merton College The Mathematical Institute and Merton College are seeking applications for the Regius Professorship of Mathematics, with effect from 1 October 2026 or as soon as possible thereafter. The professorship will become available on the retirement of the inaugural postholder, Professor Sir Andrew Wiles FRS.
